EmailTemplate.name: Service Bulletin Template (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Bulletin Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir or Madam:
Please find the attached Service Bulletin. This bulletin is being sent to you to outline changes or enhancements in the service parts or components you have purchased.
If you have questions, please contact your local Danfoss Power Solutions representative.
Thank you and have a great day!
